org.gm4java.im4java

Class GMBatchCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.im4java.process.ProcessStarter
      • org.im4java.core.ImageCommand
        • org.gm4java.im4java.GMBatchCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.im4java.process.ErrorConsumer

    public class GMBatchCommand
extends org.im4java.core.ImageCommand
    This class wraps the GM command in interactive or batch mode.

    Note: Does not support asynchronous mode; Does not support BufferedImage

    Author:
    Kenneth Xu
